评论概述: Not baggy, stone wash in weird spot, looks nothing like photo
评论详情: These pants look NOTHING, and I mean nothing like the photo  They are high waters on me and not baggy at all.  I just can't with the position of the stone washing. It's like the pants got moved in the process and it got sprayed on in the wrong spot. If you're taller than 5'4, these pants are not going to be baggy at all  The material is nice and thick and seem fine otherwise, so all is not bad. Solid 3 stars

The length and material is nice. However the waist is so ridiculously high it’s uncomfortable. I would have liked them if it was at least mid rise. For the price I want my clothes to meet expectations. I’m returning.

评论概述: XXL is not actually a XXL
评论详情: Trying to find baggy jeans is the hardest thing ever. These jeans do not fit and I wanna cry. Don’t waste your time if you’re full figured or curvy. They won’t fit.

The fit is nice, the fabric is soft, very flattering on your body and the weight is average. They are not stretchy so buy them in your size. The fabric is soft and smooth. They are true to size. I am 5’5” 178 and I bought XL THEY FIT PERFECTLY

评论概述: It did not fit at all
评论详情: Not true to size

This product fit perfectly around my waist and the perfect length. I don’t know why some ppl said it doesn’t fit cause at least for me it fit like a glove! Best jeans I own! They don’t even have that extra space in the back!

评论概述: DO NOT BUY IF YOU ARE CURVY!!
评论详情: I am a curvy girl with wide hips and a belly, I bought these hoping they would fit me and sadly, it didn’t even go past my stomach. The zipper couldn’t even close and it’s very tight around my thighs! There is absolutely no stretch at all and I get that jeans don’t usually have stretch, but this fabric was stiff and heavy which I did not feel comfortable with. I was expecting it to fit my waist since this is an XL which is my usual size. However, they’re very long and baggy on my legs which look ridiculous on me. It’s pretty clear that these jeans aren’t for my body type, I do not recommend them at all!!

评论概述: Not bad but not low rise
评论详情: It says it’s low rise but it’s absolutely not low rise. It’s mid rise. Fit is weird above the waist but is otherwise comfortable. Will wear it but won’t order again. Good color. Well made.

I actually  love these pants so much, they are so cute!!,  I weight 135 lbs so I got size XL or XXL I forgot lol, but these are super cute!, I love them, they are also very comfy, feels like like wearing sweatpants, the fit is pretty well, not too tight or loose!, id say it's definitely  worth the price.

whatever size you are on the size chart, get one bigger. don’t listen to people about the texture. they’re nothing like leggings. very much good quality jeans. mine are too small for me so i will be returning and getting a bigger size. besides size, 10/10
I could have sized up one, but I still love them sm! I struggle with finding jeans that fit but these are perfect

We grabbed these out of the bag and it was finally something that didn't smell like a factory, in fact, they have no smell!!! I got a small for my 5"1' child, they're comfy and fit her waist. Will buy again in other colors and 100% recommend! <3
i ordered the 2x and when it came it wasn’t even close to an actual 2x size. so don’t waste your money on these, very disappointed in the sizing but the actual jean quality was nice.

评论概述: surpassed my expectations to these jeans !!!
评论详情: i ordered a size small (im 5’0) and these are great! the quality is pretty good and i love them. although, these jeans are a bit long. the color is on point from the picture online! so comfortable to wear for any occasion. i definitely recommend this product.

评论概述: Sizing is wrong! In comparison to description
评论详情: The description says it’s a low waist sits low baggy jeans. When a woman measures her waist it’s at the thinnest part just below the solar plexus. I measured a 32 inch waist and I bought the pant accordingly as a medium said 32 inch waist but the picture where the pants actually hang on the model is below the belly button and if you measure there, you will be able to order the right size. When I measure there, I get 40 inches, big difference
My daughter love these pants and they fit her so perfect and they are great quality.

评论概述: Bad fit and not as advertised
评论详情: I am 165 centimeters and 52 kilograms, so I’m usually a size small, but when I bought these jeans in a small, they were too long and didn’t fit my waist, which is 66 centimeters. They also just looked funny on me and not at all like the pictures, but I also have a more muscular build than the model. I wouldn’t buy these and I’m going to return them.

These jeans are okay, but they are definitely not low rise. They don't fit me great but I knew they probably wouldn't going into it because I'm tall with a small waist. The crotch of these is definitely way too long to be low rise but they're soft nonetheless. I feel like they just look cheap. The button is noisy and flimsy and I'm worried it might break off. If you want jeans, it's better to just go to your local Old Navy and pick up some jeans for the same price but higher quality.

I bought this for myself hoping for a cute pair of jeans, and i got exactly that. They aren’t really stretchy, they are a normal jean material, its well made, flattering, and fits perfectly. I hope you enjoy these jeans as much as I do!
My daughter loved them.
Fits great, good material! Love these

If you’re wanting the high waisted but baggy legs, these are the jeans. I absolutely love them. They were a bit too long for me so I cut the bottoms off a bit with some fabric scissors. Overall, I’d definitely buy these again.

The jeans are heavy good quality material. They are soft, not scratchy. I am 5'4" and 135lbs. I ordered Medium. They are a perfect length. They touch the floor perfectly when I am barefoot, and with a shoe they pucker a little at the bottom, which I like. I like the medium-rise because the top of the waist is about 1inch below my belly button. These are fitted until the hips and then the legs fall straight down loosely. I like the fit and the jeans.
normally wear a size M, bought a size S and it was still big + long, the pants are great but keep in mind that you might want to take a one size smaller

评论概述: These were very uncomfortable for me
评论详情: These are meant for a different body shape than my own.  VERY WIDE and heavy, very long. Material very stiff.
The quality is excellent, and they hold their shape after multiple washes. Highly recommend for a trendy, laid-back look!
I'm 5'9 so I was worried about them being short but I got a medium and it actually fits !!! Definitely recommended
hips fit, but waist was loose.

Beautiful and well made pants! Super comfortable and pretty. The fabric is stretch and soft. The design is gorgeous and trendy! The color is great. They are true to size... I am 5’4” and weight 130 pounds, and I usually wear size small. I ordered these pants in small and they fit perfect, but a little baggy at the front. Great experience, recommended!

My daughter absolutely loves these jeans. They made it as her first day of school pants she loves them so much. I got a whole fashion show with all the different ways they can be styled before she settled on the fit for the day. They look good, they fit true to size and the material feels quality and it holds up well with washing. So they're a huge win in my book.

评论概述: Use the sizing chart before you order!!!
评论详情: Since when is 2XL a size 12 US?! Make sure that you check the sizing chart correctly before you order, because if you order your regular size it will be way too small. If you go by the sizing chart provided you won’t be disappointed, the jeans are well made and the cut is really cute. Just make sure you check the sizing before ordering!
The sizing is way off! The fabric is cheap, as well as the quality of the jeans. My granddaughter hasn't even worn them because it is not beneficial to spend money altering them
Very cute jeans, but if you struggle with a pudge like me you may want to size up! Still giving them 5 stars.
Was a little bigger then expected but it's well done. I think you should get your size the exact size, but i wanted mines to be baggy so yea
Fun and comfy!

The pants are honestly very good. The material is like a softer denim and very comfortable. They are baggy like the picture and the color is similar to the picture. I’m 5’4 and 115ibs so I got a small, and they are a bit long. Definitely not short girl friendly, and I wouldn’t consider myself short.
